page.title: 05Recreation
page.content: {Recreation}is limited in this area to football,bowls,squash,snooker,billiard s,darts,cycling,fishing,walking,librar y reading,books being supplied by the mobile libary van every fortnight. Any other{entertainment}is found outside the area but this involves travelling usually by car,therefore adding more cost to ones{leisure {activities. Due to the increase in the cost of living people find it more economical to entertain or{socialise}at home,very often brewing their own wine or beer. The traditional meeting place in the local{pub}is dominated by the younger generation who have not as yet got family responsibilities.The local {cinemas}are gradually being replaced by home{videos}and many of the local cinemas are now being used as{Bingo halls.
